title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: Self-Directed Learning for Enhancing Hotel Managers' Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze learning factors in hotel management tasks using survey design and regression analysis techniques.
They can explain how risk-taking ability and learning attitudes influence job performance, and develop personalized learning strategies based on this.
Learners can develop data-driven decision-making models applicable to hotel management settings based on research findings.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
